def Load(widget): if widget.ProviderWidget == None or widget.ProviderWidget.Entity == None: return
ordemCompra = widget.ProviderWidget.Entity
if ordemCompra.Status.Index == 2: ehConfirmada = ordemCompra.Status.Index == 2 widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = not ehConfirmada widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = not ehConfirmada widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = not ehConfirmada elif ordemCompra.Status.Index == 5: ehCancelada = ordemCompra.Status.Index == 5 widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = not ehCancelada widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = not ehCancelada widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = not ehCancelada elif ordemCompra.Status.Index == 3: ehRecebendo = ordemCompra.Status.Index == 3 widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = not ehRecebendo widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = not ehRecebendo widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = not ehRecebendo elif ordemCompra.Status.Index == 4: ehEncerrada = ordemCompra.Status.Index == 3 widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = not ehEncerrada widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = not ehEncerrada widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = not ehEncerrada
